评论概述: A very good value with a couple of issues
评论详情: So I bought a pair and the waist size was perfect, no issues there, nice and roomy pants, and the quality appears to be at least as good as other clothes retailers that cost much more, these will last many years.  Two things I didn't like.  First the inseam was off, too long. I fixed this by turning them from uncuffed pants to cuffed pants and now they really good. I think the inseam was off by one inch.  Second when you first put them on the buttons are really hard to get though the buttonholes, if you keep your wallet in your back pocket it is hard to open the back pocket.  So when the pants arrive put the buttons through the buttonholes a few times before you wear them, this will loosen them up.  Overall review: Not quite as good as a certain company whose initials are L.E., but half the price.

评论概述: My Favorite Pair of Pants Right Now!
评论详情: Hands down, these are the most comfortable everyday wear pants I have right now. Bar none.  These are comfortable for working in my woodshop, have a little pocket in the pocket to slip my earplugs when I remove them, and they still look good to go out shopping or to dinner.  I’m wearing them in Central Alabama USA and am about to buy several more pairs.  They go through the washer well. Fit perfectly, and the fabric is comfy and keeps me warm in these recent cold days over the holidays.  I highly recommend them to anyone else doing inside and outside work.
Overall these are good pants for the price.  Making the front pockets a little deeper would greatly improve.

The washing instructions have always said wash warm.  My most recent purchases of the same waist size came in.  Washing instructions now say wash in cold water.  I did and dried on low.  The waist is too small on 3 of the 5 pairs and the other 2 fit normally.  I noticed the pockets are not as deep now.  I’m guessing they changed fabric or manufacturer.  A let down.

Otherwise the pants fit well, seem very durable, and are a nice color.

评论概述: A must have in any wardrobe
评论详情: I recently purchased the Amazon Essentials Men's Classic-Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt, and I couldn't be more pleased with my choice! This shirt has quickly become a staple in my wardrobe.  **Fit and Comfort:** The classic fit is perfect for my build, providing a comfortable yet polished look. It allows enough room for movement without feeling baggy. The fabric is soft against the skin, making it suitable for all-day wear, whether at the office or out for dinner.  **Wrinkle Resistance:** True to its name, this shirt is remarkably wrinkle-resistant. I often travel for work, and it's great to know that I can pull it out of my suitcase and look sharp without needing to iron. It maintains a crisp appearance throughout the day, even after sitting in meetings or commuting.  **Versatility:** This shirt is incredibly versatile and can be dressed up with slacks for formal occasions or paired with jeans for a more casual look. The variety of colors available also allows me to mix and match easily with different outfits.  **Quality:** I was pleasantly surprised by the quality for such an affordable price. The stitching is solid, and the buttons feel secure. It’s clear that this shirt is made to last, even with regular washing.  I highly recommend the Amazon Essentials Men's Classic-Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt to anyone looking for a reliable and stylish addition to their wardrobe. It combines comfort, durability, and excellent value, making it a must-have for both professional and casual settings. I will definitely be purchasing more in different colors!

Ordered for my son.  Traditionally, when you order 38 x 32 pants, the pants are actually a 38 inch waist and 32 inches in length.  The waist seemed correct; however, the pants were more than 3 inches longer than they should be when compared to other 32 inch long pants.  Decided to return rather than spend more money having them hemmed.  Even though this is a defective product, I've just learned there is no longer a free option for me to make returns.  I can drive 30 minutes away, pay to have a label mailed to me, or print out a label and pack in a box at my expense.  I chose the latter, but my label didn't meet standards so I had to buy a label from the UPS store to get it mailed.  If Amazon is going to change the way they accept returns, they should let customers know so we can decide if we are going to roll the dice when purchasing their products.

评论概述: Perfect Fit, Comfortable, and Low Maintenance!
评论详情: These Amazon Essentials Chino pants are exactly what I needed! The classic-fit design is both comfortable and sharp, perfect for wearing to work or casual outings. The wrinkle-resistant fabric is a game-changer—I can pull them out of the dryer and wear them right away without worrying about ironing.  The material feels sturdy but isn’t too stiff, and they’ve held up well after multiple washes. I especially like the flat-front style, which gives them a sleek, modern look.  For the price, these chinos are an amazing deal. Great fit, great comfort, and no wrinkles—what more could you ask for? Highly recommend!

评论详情: update: i've been wearing them for awhile and even with the faults was considering raising my review to 4 stars as they've been working alright and was going to buy a few more pair. then i saw they've raised the price to over 5x as much as they previously were. so instead i now have to lower my review. for the low quality you receive they are 100% not worth the current price tabe of 30 dollars a pair. this is wild...  I'm stuck at a 2.5 for them teetering been 2-3, i waited to received all 7 pairs i ordered(2,2,3) before reviewing as a pair in the second two had a missing button and I'm totally 3 different pairs had problems or defects some messed up sewing a couple broken or unconnected belt loops a front button that's near falling off.  I wish i could at least give 3 stars, if it has only been the one pair I'd have went with 4 stars and considered 5, the pants themselves are off good quality, the pairs fully made are a bit long but i expected that , pockets are small but bigger than you might think but that could be a deal breaker, over all though my experience is mixed i would say they could be with a try, if they improve quality control some these could be a solid 10 out of 10 every time in my opinion but currently it's a bit of a gamble.  (May lower or raise later after I've had some time to wear and test them more to see how comfortable and durable they are, but first impressions werent bad, just been cold weather)
